Class Density

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.math.nebtda.Potential

public class Density
extends Potential

Implements a density estimator for data.

Author:
Henry Adams, Atanas Atanasov

getMeanShift

public VectorDouble getMeanShift(VectorDouble point)
Computes the mean shift at a point. See equation (8) of "Mean shift, mode seeking, and clustering" by Yizong Cheng.

Parameters:
